title: Somalia AI Readiness Assessment Questionnaire
introduction: This questionnaire aims to assess Somalia's readiness for the adoption and implementation of Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies. Your responses will help identify key strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats related to AI development in Somalia. Please answer each question honestly and thoughtfully, considering your knowledge and experience within the Somali context. This assessment is crucial for informing policy decisions, resource allocation, and strategic planning for AI in Somalia.

sections.name: Infrastructure and Data
sections.description: This section focuses on the availability and quality of infrastructure and data necessary for AI development and deployment in Somalia.

questions.text: To what extent do you agree that Somalia has adequate digital infrastructure (internet connectivity, data centers, electricity) to support AI initiatives?
What is your assessment of the availability of relevant data (e.g., demographic, economic, health) for AI development in Somalia?
How reliable is the electricity supply in your region for running AI-related infrastructure?
To what extent do you agree that existing data governance frameworks in Somalia adequately address data privacy and security concerns related to AI?
What are the main challenges in accessing and utilizing data for AI development in Somalia?
To what extent are existing telecommunication networks adequate for AI applications?
Are there sufficient data storage facilities to support AI development?

sections.name: Government and Policy
sections.description: This section explores the role of the Somali government in fostering AI development through policy, regulation, and investment.

questions.text: Does Somalia have a national AI strategy or policy framework?
options: No, and no plans for one

questions.text: To what extent do you agree that the Somali government is actively promoting AI research and development?
Are there any specific regulations or laws in Somalia that either encourage or hinder AI development?
How effective is the government in utilizing AI technologies to improve public services (e.g., healthcare, education, security)?
To what extent do you agree that the government is investing in digital infrastructure to support AI adoption?
How would you rate the government's efforts to promote collaboration between academia, industry, and government in the field of AI?
Is there public awareness campaigns about AI and its potential benefits and risks in Somalia?

sections.name: Skills and Education
sections.description: This section assesses the availability of skilled personnel and educational opportunities in AI-related fields in Somalia.

questions.text: To what extent do you agree that Somalia has a sufficient talent pool of AI experts and data scientists?
Are there adequate educational programs and training opportunities in AI-related fields within Somalia?
How accessible are these AI-related educational programs to individuals from different socioeconomic backgrounds in Somalia?
What are the main skills gaps in the Somali workforce that need to be addressed to support AI development?
Are there initiatives to promote STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) education in Somalia, especially among women and girls?
To what extent are Somali universities and vocational schools equipped to provide quality AI education?
How would you rate the level of digital literacy among the general population in Somalia?

sections.name: Private Sector Development
sections.description: This section examines the role of the private sector in driving AI innovation and adoption in Somalia.

questions.text: To what extent are Somali businesses investing in AI technologies and solutions?
Are there many AI startups or technology companies operating in Somalia?
What are the main barriers preventing private sector investment in AI in Somalia?
How supportive is the business environment in Somalia for AI startups and innovation?
Are there any venture capital or angel investor networks that are actively investing in AI-related ventures in Somalia?
How readily do Somali businesses adopt new technologies?
To what extent are international companies partnering with Somali businesses on AI projects?

sections.name: Ethics and Inclusion
sections.description: This section focuses on the ethical considerations and inclusivity aspects of AI development and deployment in Somalia.

questions.text: To what extent are ethical considerations being addressed in the development and deployment of AI technologies in Somalia?
Are there any guidelines or frameworks in place to ensure responsible and ethical AI development in Somalia?
How inclusive is the AI development process in Somalia, considering factors such as gender, ethnicity, and socioeconomic background?
What are the potential risks and biases associated with AI applications in Somalia, and how can they be mitigated?
To what extent is the public aware of the ethical implications of AI?
Are there mechanisms to address grievances or concerns related to AI-powered systems?
To what extent are cultural sensitivities being considered in the design and implementation of AI systems?

sections.name: Sectoral Applications
sections.description: This section explores the potential applications of AI in various sectors of the Somali economy and society.

questions.text: In which sectors do you believe AI has the greatest potential to make a positive impact in Somalia?
To what extent is AI being used in the agriculture sector to improve crop yields and livestock management?
How can AI be leveraged to improve access to quality healthcare services in Somalia, especially in remote areas?
Are there any successful examples of AI applications in the Somali education system?
To what extent can AI be used to enhance security and stability in Somalia?
How can AI improve governance and public administration in Somalia?
To what extent are financial institutions exploring AI applications to improve financial inclusion and combat fraud?
